abilities.name: Amane Flux
abilities.description: A focused technique granting Awakened status, boosting ATK by 10% and DEF by 5%. Improves combat effectiveness through disciplined execution.

abilities.name: Amane Veil
abilities.description: Grants Awakened to nearby allies, boosting ATK & MAG by 25% and DEF by 15%. Awakened units can trigger extra effects when using abilities together. At full charge, upgrades aura effects and enables powerful coordinated strikes.

abilities.name: Hex Arts
abilities.description: Weaves arcane energy, boosting ATK & MAG by 10% and DEF by 6%. Enhanced effects when used with thematic abilities. weaving arcane energy to boost MAG by 10% and restore 5% MP per turn.

abilities.name: Arcane Technique
abilities.description: Channels mystic power, increasing ATK & MAG by 15% and DEF by 9%. Enhanced effects when used with thematic abilities. establishing a Mystic Circle that grants Enchanted status to allies (+15% MAG, spell immunity).

abilities.name: Annette Echo
abilities.description: A focused technique that grants Fortified status, improving combat effectiveness through disciplined execution.

abilities.name: Annette Veil
abilities.description: A focused technique that grants Linked status, improving combat effectiveness through disciplined execution.

abilities.name: Cait Vanguard
abilities.description: A focused technique granting Ascendant status, boosting ATK by 10% and DEF by 5%. Improves combat effectiveness through disciplined execution.

abilities.name: Cait Echo
abilities.description: A focused technique granting Linked status, boosting ATK by 10% and DEF by 5%. Improves combat effectiveness through disciplined execution.
